timeline.bodyText:
Isn't this already in here a few lines above this:

Please make sure to install the following dependencies.
Required:
java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel.x86_64 / openjdk-8-jdk
timeline.author: lkiesow
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -71,6 +71,13 @@ Required for animate service (optional):
 
     synfig
 
+
+Java version support

replies.bodyText: I deliberately added it again to emphasise that JDK 8, and only 8, is required.  That being said, your solution makes things even more clear, so I'll remove this part.  If you're installing from source and can't follow the directions closely enough then that's not really something we can fix :)
replies.author: gregorydlogan

timeline.message: Removing duplicate JDK version support bits from the source install docs.  Adding a hard exit on startup if an incorrect JDK is in use.
Removing duplicate JDK version support bits from the source install docs.  Adding a hard exit on startup if an incorrect JDK is in use.
